articles.description: Follow live text updates from day one of the fourth Test between India and England in Ranchi.
articles.title: England win toss and bat first in fourth Test

articles.description: A court in Spain has sentenced Alves, who played for Barcelona and Brazil, to four and a half years.
articles.title: Dani Alves trial: Ex-Brazil player guilty of nightclub rape

articles.description: New Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe did not duck difficult questions - but will be judged by fans on results, not words, writes BBC sports editor Dan Roan.
articles.title: Passion and steel - what Ratcliffe showed in first interview

articles.description: England leg-spinner Rehan Ahmed is leaving the tour of India because of an urgent family matter and will not return.
articles.title: England leg-spinner Ahmed to leave tour of India

articles.description: AC Milan cement their place in Friday's Europa League last-16 draw despite losing a thriller against Rennes in France.
articles.title: AC Milan advance despite losing thriller to Rennes

articles.description: The negative reaction to England's third Test defeat by India was disproportionate and they will not change their approach for the fourth Test. says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'Not every Test has to put Bazball on trial'

articles.description: England captain Jamie George says Saturday's game against Scotland will be a "special one" following the death of his mother.
articles.title: Scotland game 'special' after mother's death - George

articles.description: Real Madrid midfielder Toni Kroos has come out of international football retirement for Euro 2024 hosts Germany.
articles.title: Kroos announces Germany international comeback

articles.description: Mercedes' George Russell says Red Bull are "a step ahead of everyone" before the new Formula 1 season.
articles.title: F1 pre-season testing: George Russell says Red Bull are 'a step ahead of everyone'

articles.description: Super Bowl winners Kansas City Chiefs sign punter Matt Araiza, who was removed from a civil case alleging his involvement in the gang rape of a 17-year-old girl.
articles.title: Matt Araiza: Super Bowl winners Kansas City Chiefs sign punter after he is dropped from civil case
